Performer:
Yoshida Seinosuke (see also Toyomatsu Seinosuke) (吉田清之助)

Alternate Name: Toyomatsu Seinosuke (豊松清之助)

Dates: '1986/11-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Puppeteer:

January 1987: The Pregnant Mountain Ogress (Heroine)

February 1987: The Courtesan Yugiri
